title: Core Beliefs — Catholic
intro: This page captures my core convictions in obedience to Scripture and the Magisterium. It serves as the landing to study the Catechism and begin Discern.

beliefs.title: Jesus Christ is the only way to the Father
beliefs.summary: Salvation comes through Jesus alone — His Cross, Resurrection, and New Covenant.

beliefs.title: The Holy Eucharist (New Covenant)
beliefs.summary: We receive Christ truly — Body, Blood, Soul, and Divinity — instituted at the Last Supper.

beliefs.title: Confession & Worthy Communion
beliefs.summary: Confession restores grace so we may receive the Eucharist worthily.

beliefs.title: Spiritual Warfare is Real
beliefs.summary: We resist the devil clothed in God’s armor; goodness without grace is exposure.
